name: Light at the End of the Tunnels
name_original: Light at the End of the Tunnels
description:
One of six selected spotlight features at the USC Student Games Expo 2020: 

Enter the Ghouliverse in Light at the End of the Tunnels, a virtual reality horror experience for the Oculus Rift. You play as an office intern, who needs to investigate an old mining site in order to take flash photography of the different ghouls and ghosts inhabiting the seemingly abandoned tunnels and as you search for your co-worker, Darry, before returning to your office at the end of the workday.

Key Features

  • Explore a pitch-black environment completely on-rails.
  • 6 different Ghoulies to photograph, including the Wendigo, the Mantis, Beedles, Zeta Beedles, the Space Evader, and Scary Darry.
  • Screenshot system, allowing you to view your photographs.

#vr #horror
